price: If they were to see pieces of the sky falling down[15], they would still say, “[This is only] a mass of clouds.”
arabic: وَإِن يَرَوۡاْ كِسۡفٗا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ سَاقِطٗا يَقُولُواْ سَحَابٞ مَّرۡكُومٞ
footnotes: [15] As a sign of the punishment that they requested.
